item.description:
It's the annual Pancake Breakfast at Northwest Park in Windsor. Come for a breakfast of pancakes, sausage, and real maple syrup made right at the park at 9:00.

For those interested, there will also be a hike starting at 10:00. The hike will be 2-3 miles over rolling terrain at a social pace. Kids and leashed dogs welcome on the hike.

For breakfast, meet us at the warming shed at 9:00. If you only want to hike, meet in front of the nature center at 10:00.  Gloria will be leading the hike and large group from the Hartford Area Hiking Meetup has signed up, so look for the crowd!
item.name: Pancake breakfast and/or hike
